About

I am currently working for TELOGIC as the software engineer.

Before I come onboard with TELOGIC, I was a junior software developer in REALWAT.INC where I started to learn how to engineer the code.

Besides these, I am a husband, a father, a brother, and a friend.

I like trying new stuff and making things work.

Find me on facebook if you've got questions.
